title: Handle Driver Account Deactivation Appeal
description: A driver whose account was deactivated for low ratings is appealing the decision.

tasks.description: Retrieve the driver's profile and the history of their ratings and any prior warnings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the driver's rating fell below 4.6 and they received two prior warnings.

tasks.description: Review the specific rider feedback that led to the low ratings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews comments related to unprofessionalism and unsafe driving.

tasks.description: Based on the clear history of poor performance and prior warnings, uphold the deactivation decision.
Send a notification to the driver explaining that the appeal is denied and the decision is final.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and final communication is sent to the driver.
